name: Space Cat (itch)
description:
A new game is launched!

After space mice have destroyed your spaceship and all you're left with is a jar ( doubling as a space helmet ) and an intergalactic cannon, now is the time to fight back!

How do you do it?

You shoot the space mice and the recoil will send you flying in the opposite direction,

But be careful not to bump your helmet into anything or your helmet will break and your eyes will pop out...

While you're at it pick up food floating in the levels without the space mice catching and killing you

Good luck
